TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Heroic Strike
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cost of your Heroic Strike ability by [@value] rage point.

TalentsTiers.Name: Deflection
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to parry by [@value]%

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Rend
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the bleed damage done by your Rend ability by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Charge
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the amount of rage generated by your Charge ability by [@value]. Also decreases its cooldown by [@value2] seconds.

TalentsTiers.Name: Iron Will
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the duration of all Stun and Charm effects used against you by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Tactical Mastery
TalentsTiers.Description: Greatly increases the threat generated by your Bloodthirst and Mortal Strike abilities when you are in Defensive Stance.[@value]

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Overpower
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Overpower ability by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Anger Management
TalentsTiers.Description: Generates 1 rage per 3 seconds.

TalentsTiers.Name: Impale
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Warrior abilities by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Deep Wounds
TalentsTiers.Description: Your critical strikes cause the opponent to bleed, dealing [@value]% of your melee weapon's average damage over 6 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Taste for Blood
TalentsTiers.Description: Whenever your Rend ability causes damage, you have a [@value]% chance of allowing the use of your Overpower ability for 9 sec. 1 charge. This effect can not occur more than once every 6 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Poleaxe Specialization
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike and the critical damage caused with Axes and Polearms by [@value]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Sweeping Strikes
TalentsTiers.Description:
30 Rage
30 sec cooldown

Your next 5 melee attacks strike an additional nearby opponent.

TalentsTiers.Name: Mace Specialization
TalentsTiers.Description: Your attacks with maces have a [@value]% chance to stun your target for 3 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Sword Specialization
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives you a [@value]% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after hitting your target with your Sword. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.

TalentsTiers.Name: Weapon Mastery
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the chance for your attacks to be dodged by [@value]% and reduces the duration of all Disarm effects used against you by [@value2]%. This does not stack with other Disarm duration reducing effects.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Hamstring
TalentsTiers.Description: Gives your Hamstring ability a [@value]% chance to immobilize the target for 5 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Trauma
TalentsTiers.Description: Your melee critical strikes increase the effectiveness of Bleed effects on the target by [@value]% for 15 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Second Wind
TalentsTiers.Description: Whenever you are struck by a Stun or Immobilize effect you will generate [@value] rage and [@value2]% of your total health over 10 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Mortal Strike
TalentsTiers.Description:
30 Rage
Melee range

Instant
6 sec cooldown

A vicious strike that deals 110% weapon damage plus 380 and wounds the target, reducing the effectiveness of any healing by 50% for 10 sec.

Talent Has Trainable Ranks

TalentsTiers.Name: Strength of Arms
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your Strength and Stamina by [@value]% and your Expertise by [@value2].

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Slam
TalentsTiers.Description: Decreases the swing time of your Slam ability by [@value] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Juggernaut
TalentsTiers.Description: Your Charge ability is now usable while in combat. Following a Charge, your next Slam or Mortal Strike has an additional 25% chance to critically hit if used within 10 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Improved Mortal Strike
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases the damage caused by your Mortal Strike ability by [@value]% and reduces the cooldown by [@value2] sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Unrelenting Assault
TalentsTiers.Description: Reduces the cooldown of your Overpower and Revenge abilities by [@value] seconds and increases the damage done by both abilities by [@value2]%. In addition, if you strike a player with overpower while they are casting, their magical damage and healing will be reduced by 25% for 6 sec.

TalentsTiers.Name: Sudden Death
TalentsTiers.Description: Your melee critical hits have a [@value]% chance of allowing the use of Execute regardless of the target's health state. In addition, you keep [@value2] rage after using Execute.

TalentsTiers.Name: Endless Rage
TalentsTiers.Description: You generate 25% more rage from damage dealt.

TalentsTiers.Name: Blood Frenzy
TalentsTiers.Description: Increases your melee attack speed by [@value]%. In addition your Rend and Deep Wound abilities also increase all physical damage caused to that target by [@value2]%.

TalentsTiers.Name: Wrecking Crew
TalentsTiers.Description: Your melee critical hits Enrage you, increasing all damage caused by [@value]% for 12 sec. This effect does not stack with Enrage.

TalentsTiers.Name: Bladestorm
TalentsTiers.Description:
25 Rage
Instant

Requires Melee Weapon
1.5 min cooldown

Instantly Whirlwind all nearby targets and for the next 6 sec you will perform a whirlwind attack every 1 sec. While under the effects of Bladestorm, you can move but cannot perform any other abilities but you do not feel pity or remorse or fear and you cannot be stopped unless killed.
